data.name: Jelly Brawl: Classic
data.detailed_description:
GET JELLY BRAWL

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1278350/Jelly_Brawl/


JOIN US ON DISCORD

Participate in competitions, giveaways, and meet other players!


About the Game

Jelly Brawl: Classic is a FREE sticky and destructive multiplayer party game where you gotta flop, and pop your way to the top! Fight alone or against friends and experience the mayhem of the Classic mode as you struggle to be the last jelly standing!

Features

  • SLIMEY PHYSICS BASED MAYHEM! With simple point and go controls, Jelly Brawl is easy to pick up but hard to master. Without quick reactions and well timed taps, it’s easy to lose control of the slick jelly.

  • UP TO 4 PLAYERS VERSUS PLAY! Face off against up to four of your friends in local and online multiplayer! Fight to be the last jelly standing on the stage or take the victory in one of the many mini games!*

  • A WHOLE SLEW OF MINI GAMES! Duke it out in "Classic mode" where you fight to be the last jelly standing while facing off in a variety of boss rounds in classic mini game fashion.

  • ENDLESS CHALLENGES AND UNLOCKABLES! Complete endless challenges and level up to unlock new playable skins, stages, and modes!

*Local Multiplayer requires the use of controllers. Only one player can use a keyboard and mouse.

data.short_description: Jelly Brawl: Classic is a FREE sticky and destructive multiplayer party game where you gotta flop, and pop your way to the top! Fight alone or against friends and experience the mayhem of the Classic mode as you struggle to be the last jelly standing!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD A4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD HD 6850, Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64bit Processor and OS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD A6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64bit Processor and OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.7 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64bit Processor and OS
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.15 and higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (3.1 GHz)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780m
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64bit Processor and OS

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux (Most distributions should work)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, AMD A4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD HD 6850, Intel HD 630
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64bit Processor and OS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD A6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64bit Processor and OS
